code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={categoryId:0,currentPage:1,searchValue:'',sort:{name:'популярности',sortProperty:'rating'}};var filterSlice=createSlice({name:'filter',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setCategotyId:function setCategotyId(state,action){state.categoryId=action.payload;},setSearchValue:function setSearchValue(state,action){state.searchValue=action.payload;},setSort:function setSort(state,action){state.sort=action.payload;},setCurrentPage:function setCurrentPage(state,action){state.currentPage=action.payload;},setFliters:function setFliters(state,action){state.sort=action.payload.sort;state.currentPage=Number(action.payload.currentPage);state.categoryId=Number(action.payload.categoryId);}}});export var slectetFilter=function slectetFilter(state){return state.filter;};export var selectSort=function selectSort(state){return state.filter.sort;};var _filterSlice$actions=filterSlice.actions,setSearchValue=_filterSlice$actions.setSearchValue,setCategotyId=_filterSlice$actions.setCategotyId,setSort=_filterSlice$actions.setSort,setCurrentPage=_filterSlice$actions.setCurrentPage,setFliters=_filterSlice$actions.setFliters;export{setSearchValue,setCategotyId,setSort,setCurrentPage,setFliters};export default filterSlice.reducer;
